Articles.Content: Hey I am Dalzar! I love this game it's amazing. I am here to help people and chat with other players. I really look forward to chatting with you all ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hello Dalzar, and welcome to the forums !

Enjoy your flight, cheers !
Hola Senor! Welcome to the forums and enjoy your time here. Psst, don't be like Porkjet, if anyone knows what I mean.

Welcome to the forums! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) If you're here to chat about KSP, you've found the right place. Feel free to share your experiences, show off your favorite craft designs, or ask for advice on your next project (or help out others who may need it themselves).
Welcome Dalzar, we would love to see some of your creations! Welcome to the boards.
